# representedElementCategory

**Instance Property**

A category that identifies the item, such as decoration or supplementary view.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var representedElementCategory: UICollectionView.ElementCategory { get }
```

## Identifying the item

- **name**: The name of the item.
- **representedElementKind**: A string that identifies the type of item.

items.description: A string that identifies the type of item.
items.name: representedElementKind
